text: Wild Card is a 2015 crime drama movie. Jason Statham plays security guard Nick Wild, who has a gambling problem. Stanley Tucci plays Baby. Anne Heche plays Roxy. The movie was released by Lionsgate. It is based on the novel Heat. It is a remake of a movie from 1986 called Heat. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2015 crime drama movies Category:2010s American crime drama movies Category:2010s English-language movies Category:Movie remakes Category:Movies set in Las Vegas Category:Movies directed by Simon West Category:Lionsgate movies
title: Wild Card (movie)
